citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The Attending Veterinarian has not made a site visit in over a year and a half. Lack of regular veterinary visits could allow
the development of disease, nutritional, or care problems which could cause illness in the animals.
Regularly scheduled (at least annually) visits to the premise by the Attending Veterinarian should occur to allow for
oversight of health and care of the animals.
To be corrected by 12/1/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The Attending Veterinarian has not made a site visit in over a year and a half. Lack of regular veterinary visits could allow 
the development of disease, nutritional, or care problems which could cause illness in the animals.  
Regularly scheduled (at least annually) visits to the premise by the Attending Veterinarian should occur to allow for 
oversight of health and care of the animals. 
 
To be corrected by 12/1/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
